title: Sunstone logo + typeface
content:
Hi Typohiles

I need some critique on this logo, before I turn it into a complete typeface.

Anyone?

Best Regards

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021054933im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sunstone_Serif_01.gif)
author: jaksi

comments.content: The "e" looks kind of squooshed... like someone bashed the right side of it against a wall.
